attributes.action: declare that a person can only be referred to as prime minister if they have been elected into office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Should a person take up the post of prime minister without having been elected into that particular office by the electorate, then he or she will be known as 'prime minister-designate', until such time as they have been voted into office by the electorate to be their prime minister, in a free and democratic election. This will help to distinguish between political leaders who are elected by the people, and those who are imposed upon them.
